013package org.apache.juneau.swaps;
014
015import java.net.*;
016
017import org.apache.juneau.*;
018import org.apache.juneau.swap.*;
019
020/**
021 * Transforms {@link URL} objects to and from {@link String Strings}.
022 *
023 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
024 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/SwapBasics">Swap Basics</a>
025 * </ul>
026 */
027public class UrlSwap extends StringSwap<URL> {
028
029   @Override /* ObjectSwap */
030   public String swap(BeanSession session, URL o) throws Exception {
031      return o.toString();
032   }
033
034   @Override /* ObjectSwap */
035   public URL unswap(BeanSession session, String o, ClassMeta<?> hint) throws Exception {
036      return new URI(o).toURL();
037   }
038}
